nodes.text: The Ryloth blockade was a fleet of the Confederacy of Independent Systems during the Clone Wars. The blockade consisted of the Lucrehulk-class Droid Control Ship Procurer and six Munificent-class star frigates. It was blockading the planet of Ryloth under the command of Neimoidian captain Mar Tuuk, and was mostly destroyed by the attack of the Galactic Republic fleet during the Battle of Ryloth. The remainders of the blockade were eventually routed by the forces of Jedi General Anakin Skywalker.
